attributes.name: LabsLayersComponent
attributes.description:
Renders a collection of composer-compatible layer groups.

// routes/application.js
import Route from '@ember/routing/route';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  async model() {
    return [{
      id: 'roads',
      layers: [{
        id: 'highways',
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'orange',
          },
        },
      }, {
        id: 'streets',
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'blue',
          },
        },
      }]
    }];
  }
}


{{!-- routes/application.hbs --}}
{{#labs-map as |map|}} 
  {{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model}}
{{/labs-map}}

arguments.name: map
arguments.description:
Reference to a instance of a MapboxGL map. Handled internally when using contextual components:

  {{#labs-map as |map|}}
{{map.labs-layers layerGroups=model}}
  {{/labs-map}}

arguments.name: onLayerClick
arguments.description: Event fired on layer click. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and clicked layer.

arguments.name: onLayerMouseMove
arguments.description: Event fired on layer mousemove. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and found layer.

arguments.name: onLayerMouseLeave
arguments.description: Event fired on layer mouseleave. Scoped to individual layers. Returns the mouse event and found layer.

arguments.name: toolTipComponent
arguments.description: Name of local component to use in place of default component.

attributes.name: LabsLayersTooltipComponent
attributes.description:
Renders a component when a "tooltipable" layer is hovered. 

// routes/application.js
import Route from '@ember/routing/route';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  async model() {
    return [{
      id: 'roads',
      layers: [{
        id: 'highways',
        tooltipable: true,
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'orange',
          },
        },
      }, {
        id: 'streets',
        tooltipable: true,
        style: {
          type: 'line',
          paint: {
            'line-fill': 'blue',
          },
        },
      }]
    }];
  }
}

{{!-- routes/application.hbs --}}
{{#labs-map as |map|}} 
{{#map.labs-layers layerGroups=model as |layers|}}
  {{#layers.tooltip as |tip|}}
    This text appears over the tooltipable layer on mouseover. Yields a hash with two properties:
     - {{tip.feature}}
     - {{tip.layer}}
  {{/layers.tooltip}}
{{/map}}
{{/labs-map}}

Behavior can be overridden with a different component by passing the name of a local component to labs-layers.

arguments.name: offset
arguments.description: Offset of tooltip div element in pixels.

arguments.name: top
arguments.description: Top offset of tooltip div in pixels.

arguments.name: left
arguments.description: Left offset of tooltip div in pixels.

arguments.name: feature
arguments.description: Geographic feature of the layer that is hovered when onLayerMouseMove is fired.

arguments.name: layer
arguments.description: Layer that is hovered when onLayerMouseMove is fired.

attributes.name: LabsMapLegendComponent
attributes.description:
DEPRECATED

Opinionated handler for created map legends. Expects a layerConfig object with an items property. items are an array of objects specific the SVG attributes of the legend item.

// controller/application.js
import Controller from '@ember/routing/controller';

export default class ApplicationRoute extends Route {
  legendConfig = {
    "label":"Street Lines",
    "items":[
      {
        "type":"line",
        "label":"Mapped Street",
        "tooltip":"Tooltip information!",
        "style":{
          "fill":"none",
          "stroke": "rgba(50, 50, 50, 1)"
        }
      },
      {
        "type":"line",
        "label":"Street Treatment",
        "tooltip":"Tooltip information!",
        "style":{
          "fill":"none",
          "stroke":"rgba(84, 84, 84, 1)",
          "stroke-width":"0.5"
        }
      },
    ]
  }
}

{{labs-map-legend model=legendConfig}}

attributes.name: LayerModel
attributes.description: Model for individual layers. Belongs to a layer-group. May be called individually for state changes.

fields.name: highlightable
fields.description: Determines whether to fire mouseover events for the layer.

fields.name: tooltipable
fields.description: Determines whether to render positioned tooltip components for the layer.

fields.name: tooltipTemplate
fields.description: Optional template for tooltips. Does not handle any rendering.

fields.name: mapboxGlStyle
fields.description: Computed alias that returns a newly built mapbox layer object. Necessary to maintain state bindings.

fields.name: filter
fields.description: Getter and setter for filter. Array structure should follow Mapbox's Expression syntax.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Getter and setter for visibility. Mutates a Mapbox property that actually determines visibility. Depends on parent visibility.

attributes.name: LayerModel
attributes.description: Model for layer groups. Describes a collection of layers which are references here as a has-many relationship. Delegates state of certain properties, like visiblity, to child layers. Includes other helpful metadata.

fields.name: visible
fields.description: Abstraction for the visibility state of related layers. Mutations will fire updates to child layers. Simple modifies a property of the MapboxGL layout style property. Does not add or remove layers.

fields.name: layerVisibilityType
fields.description:
This property describes the visibility state of the associated layers. Layer groups can have:

  • singleton layers (only one or none layers are visible) the top-most layer is on by default
  • multi (many may be visible or none)
  • binary (all are visible or none are visible)

fields.name: layerIds
fields.description: Convenience property for a list of internal MapboxGL layer IDs.
